title: Water-wise lawns in a mild climate
excerpt: Raise your mowing height and feed modestly. Deep, infrequent watering builds resilience and keeps the sward calm and green.

title: Borders that breathe with the seasons
excerpt: Layer perennials with quiet structure. Let seed heads stand into winter for texture, shelter and subtle movement.
